page.title: 07Peterlee Miners Lose Jobs.
page.content: {Horden Colliery}will be closing down just before Christmas. The men who are made redundant will have a choice of going to{Wearmouth Colliery}or {Easington Colliery.}Or they might choose instead to take their redundancy money. Some men will go to{South Africa}to work in the gold mines because people from South Africa came over and talked to the men about working in the gold mines. When the miners have been made redundant they might like to do brick_ laying, go into the Army, the Royal Navy, or the Air Force. Some of the men will just find a pastime like gardening or working on their cars if they have one. They might even take a walk out with the dog!
